label: TechnicalCharacteristic
comment: A prominent technical attribute or aspect.

datatypeProperties.comment: A referenced norm or requirement that establishes uniform criteria, methods, processes and practices, such as in engineering or technical areas.
The code specifying the certification granted to this technical characteristic.
A substance from which something is or could be made.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value of the construction of this technical characteristic.
A code specifying a description of this technical characteristic.
A licence, expressed as text, for this production facility.
A code specifying a measurement method for this product characteristic.
The keeping of an animal in a particular location.
A significant occurrence or happening in a supply chain.
The code specifying the subordinate type for this production device.
A value, expressed as a monetary value, for this document characteristic.
A date, time, date time or other date time value for this document characteristic.
The value for this metric characteristic expressed as an indicator.
A value, expressed as a number, for this document characteristic.
A parameter specified for a value for this metric characteristic.
A range specified for a value of this metric characteristic.
A tolerance specified for a value of this metric characteristic.

referencedBy.comment: A prominent technical attribute or aspect.
A technical characteristic related to this supply chain event.
